    		University Printing Services
    	Whatever your project, we can help! We provide a full range of print and copy services to campus departments, auxiliaries, and individuals. We are located at MLIB-035A.Order OnlinePlace your order quickly by using our ordering website.Place Online OrderLook what University Printing Services can do for you!University Printing Services is Chico State's official print shop, offering a one stop shop for your printing, bulk mail and campus branded products. Our team is committed to providing outstanding customer service, competitive pricing, and high-quality results.Let us help you plan your next projectIt's never too early to include University Printing Services in your planning purposes. We can assist your team with reviewing our capabilities, establishing a production schedule and identifying potential cost saving opportunities. Please consider including us in your planning meetings. In partnership with our CMT (creative Media & Technology) units, our team of designers and craftspeople are proud to deliver high quality products through a superior experience.Information TechnologyKendall Hall, 109www.csuchico.edu/itSupport Our CollegeYou might be looking for...Classroom Technology ServicesStudent Print CenterGraphic DesignMedia ProductionsPhotographyPrint ServicesPresentation and Environmental GraphicsWeb ServicesInformation Technology
We acknowledge and are mindful that Chico State stands on lands that were originally occupied by the first people of this area, Mechoopda, and we recognize their distinctive spiritual relationship with this land, the flora, the fauna, and the waters that run through campus. We are humbled that our campus resides upon sacred lands that since time immemorial have sustained the Mechoopda people and continue to do so today.Contact UsNeed Help?FacebookFacebookTwitterTwitterInstagramInstagramReport an accessibility issueReport a broken link on this pageTitle IXPrivacy PolicyCalifornia State University, Chico400 West First StreetChico, CA 95929Copyright © 2023 All Rights Reserved
